title: Humanality
content: This is a work in progress based on the way letters could react to one another the way humans do. ![Humanality](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003713im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27876.jpg)
author: dday

comments.content:
Another interesting idea!   
   
But more than a font, I'd make some kind of animation of letters in words talking/dealing with each other by means of a frantic, jumping dot - and maybe stems growing/moving.   
   
hhp
The dots represent heads, yes? Would this be more appropriate/interesting as unicase?
